knimeNode.name: CAIM Applier
knimeNode.shortDescription: Takes a binning (discretization) model and a data table as input and bins (discretizes) the columns of the input data according to the model.

fullDescription.intro: This node takes a binning (discretization) model and a data table as input and bins (discretizes) the columns of the input data according to the model. All columns of the input table that can be found in the model are binned accordingly.

ports.inPort: The model representing the binning. Contains the intervals for each bin of each column.
